prompt: Chiikawastyle,Chiikawa,This image is a digital drawing of a cute, round, white cartoon character named Chiikawa. Chiikawa has a simple, minimalist design with a smooth, rounded body and a small, rounded head. The character has large, expressive black eyes with small, round pupils, and a tiny, triangular black nose. Chiikawa's cheeks are adorned with soft pink blush marks, adding to its adorable appearance. The character has a small, curved mouth forming a gentle smile. Two small, rounded ears sit atop Chiikawa's head, adding to its endearing look. The background is a plain, light beige color, which contrasts with Chiikawa's white body and makes the character stand out. The overall style of the drawing is clean and simplistic, with bold, black outlines and minimal shading, giving it a charming and approachable feel.
